T11bsa071_u:2: saṃkṣepata idamārabhyate- pakṣadharmastadaṃśena vyāpto hetustridhaiva saḥ
T11bsa071_u:9: dharmavacanenāpi parāśrayatvād dharmasya dharmyāśrayasiddhau pratyāsatteḥ sādhyadharmiṇa eva siddhiriti cet /
T11bsa071_u:12: siddhe tadaṃśavyāptyā dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi sattve punardharmiṇo vacanaṃ dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇa eva yo dharmaḥ sa heturiti niyamārthamāśaṃkyeta /
T11bsa071_u:13: dṛṣṭaṃ sajātīya eva sattvam ityavadhāraṇena sādhyābhāve siddhe 'pi vyatireke sādhyābhāve asattvavacanam, tathehāpi tadaṃśavyāptivacanāt siddhe 'pi dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi sattve tatraiva
T11bsa071_u:15: tasmāt sāmarthyād arthapratītāvapi upacāramātrāt samānanirdeśāt pratipattigauravaṃ ca parihṛtaṃ bhavati /
T11bsa071_u:24: (1.4) tasya vyāptirhi vyāpakasya tatra bhāva eva /
T11bsa071_u:26: etena anvayo vyatireko vā pakṣadharmaśca yathāsvaṃ pramāṇena niścita uktaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:29: (1.5) tatra pakṣadharmasya sādhyadharmiṇi pratyakṣato 'numānato vā prasiddhiḥ /
T11bsa071_u:30: tathā pradeśe dhūmasya, śabde vā kṛtakatvasya /
T11bsa071_u:31: sadhūmaṃ hi pradeśamarthāntaraviviktarūpamasādhāraṇātmanā dṛṣṭavataḥ smārtaṃ yathādṛṣṭabheda viṣayaṃ liṅgajñānamutpadyate /
T11bsa071_u:33: (1.6) tasmiṃstathābhūte darśanena dṛṣṭesati sa yena yenāsādhāraṇastadasādhāraṇatāṃ tato bhedamabhilapantī atadvayāvṛtiviṣayā smṛtirutpatrā pratyakṣabalena na pramāṇam /
T11bsa071_u:38: arthakriyārthī hi sarvaḥ prekṣāvān pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ vānveṣate /
T11bsa071_u:39: na ca sāmānyaṃ svalakṣaṇapratipatterūrdhvaṃ tatsāmarthyotpatravikalpavijñānagrāhyaṃ kāñcidarthakriyāmupakalpayati
T11bsa071_u:43: na ca tatsvalakṣaṇagrahaṇottarakālabhāvino nīlavikalpasya viṣayeṇa nīlasādhyārthakriyā kriyate
T11bsa071_u:44: (1.7) tasmāt anadhigatārthaviṣayaṃ pramāṇam ityapi anadhigate svalakṣaṇe
T11bsa071_u:46: adhigate tu svalakṣaṇe tatsāmarthyajanmā vikalpastadanukārī kāryatastadviṣayatvāt smṛtireva, na pramāṇam,
T11bsa071_u:51: tato 'pi vikalpāt vastunyeva tadadhyavasāyena puruṣasya pravṛtteḥ /
T11bsa071_u:56: sādhāraṇe hi kārye na teṣāṃ sāmarthyabhedaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:70: kāryakāraṇabhāva eva hyarthāntarasya evaṃ syāt- yatra
T11bsa071_u:71: dhūmastatrāvaśyamagniriti, agnibhāva eva hi bhāvo dhūmasya tatkāryatvamiti
T11bsa071_u:78: anuddiṣṭaviṣayaṃ sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvakhyāpanaṃ pratibandhamātrasiddhau sidhyatīti na tatra vyatirekasādhane anupalabdhyoḥ dṛśyaviṣayatāviśeṣaṇamapekṣyate /
T11bsa071_u:90: aparāparavyāvṛttibhedena dharmabhede satyapi vastutaḥ liṅgasvabhāva eva /
T11bsa071_u:91: hetusvabhāve sādhyadharme 'nvayavyabhicārābhāvāt lakṣaṇe tanmātrānvayeneti viśeṣaṇaṃ paramatāpekṣam
T11bsa071_u:93: tena ca viśeṣaṇena tathavidhasya atatsvabhāvatāṃ tasmin sādhye hetorvyabhicāraṃ cāha /
T11bsa071_u:97: yathā yat sat tat sarvaṃ kṣaṇikam /
T11bsa071_u:100: tathā, kṣaṇikatvābhāve sattvābhāvaḥ saṃśca śabda iti /
T11bsa071_u:106: pradeśasthaṃ dhūmamupalabdhavataḥ tasyāgninā vyāpteḥ smaraṇe tatsāmarthyādeva agniratra iti pratijñārthapratītirbhavati /
T11bsa071_u:107: na ca tatra kaścit agniratreti asmai nivedayati /
T11bsa071_u:109: kiñcit, pramāṇamantareṇaivaṃ pratīteḥ nimittābhāvāt pratītau liṅgasya vaiyarthyam /
T11bsa071_u:110: svayamevākasmāt agniratreti vyavasthāpya tatpratipattaye paścālliṅgamanusaratīti ko 'yaṃ pratipatteḥ kramaḥ? pareṇāpi taducyamānaṃ plavata eva upayogābhāvāt /
T11bsa071_u:111: viṣayopadarśanamupayoga iti cet, tenaiva tāvaddarśyamānena ko 'rthaḥ? yadi pratītiranyathā na syāttadā sarvaṃ śobheta /
T11bsa071_u:112: tasmādeṣa svayaṃpratītau kenacid viṣayopasthāpakena vināpi pratiyan asmān kāryiṇo dṛṣṭvā parvabrāhmaṇa iva vyaktaṃ mūlyaṃ mṛgayate /
T11bsa071_u:113: asmadvacanādapi svayaṃ siddhameva liṅgamanusṛtya sādhyaṃ pratyetīti ko
T11bsa071_u:117: tatra svayaṃ prameyopadarśanena vināpi pratipadya paraṃ pratipādayatrapūrva kramamāśrayate iti kimatra kāraṇam? tasmātra prameyasya vacanena kiñcitprayojanamanyathāpi pratipatterutpatteḥ (2.4) etenopanayanigamanādikamapi pratyuktam /
T11bsa071_u:119: ḍiṇḍikarāgaṃ parityajyākṣiṇī nimīlya cintaya tāvat kimiyatā pratītiḥ syātra veti /
T11bsa071_u:120: bhāve kiṃ prapañcamālayā? iti iyāneva sādhanavākye prayogo jyāyān /
T11bsa071_u:121: (2.5) atra pūrvaṃ hetuḥ prayoktavyaḥ paścād dṛṣṭānta iti kramaniyamo 'pi
T11bsa071_u:126: nahi atatsvabhāvasya bhāve ekāntenānyasya bhāvaḥ kṛtakatvasya bhāve prayatnānantarīyakatvavat
T11bsa071_u:127: kāryasyāpi atatsvabhāvasyābhāve na tannivṛttiḥ, yathānayoreva naikanivṛttāvanyanivṛttiḥ /
T11bsa071_u:128: tasmādanvayavyatirekayoryathālakṣaṇameko 'pi prayokto dvitīyamākṣipatīti naikatraṃ sādhanavākye dvayoḥ prayogaḥ iṣyate vaiyarthyāt /
T11bsa071_u:131: tadabhāva eva hetorabhāvakhyātiryathā syāt nānyatra vipakṣe viruddhe vā iti niyamakhyāpanārtho
T11bsa071_u:133: (2.7) kathamidam avagamyate sadavaśyaṃ naśvarasvabhāvamiti yena anvayavyatirekasambhava iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:135: svabhāvata eva bhāvā naśvarāḥ naiṣāṃ svahetubhyo niṣpatrānāmanyato vināśotpattiḥ /
T11bsa071_u:137: na hi vināśaheturbhāvasya svabhāvameva karoti tasya svahetubhyo nirvṛtteḥ /
T11bsa071_u:138: nāpi bhāvāntarameva, bhāvāntarakaraṇe bhāvasya tadavasthatvāt tathopalabdhyādiprasaṅgaḥ
T11bsa071_u:142: bhāvapratiṣedhakaraṇe na tasya kiñcidbhavati na bhavatyeva kevalamiti /
T11bsa071_u:143: evaṃ ca kartā na bhavatītyakarturahetutvamiti na vināśahetuḥ kaścit /
T11bsa071_u:145: yadi svabhāvato naśvaraḥ svātmanyanavasthāyī bhāvaḥ tasya na kiñcinnāśakāraṇaiḥ /
T11bsa071_u:147: yo hi yatsvabhāvaḥ sa svahetoreva utpadyamānaḥ tādṛśo bhavati, na punastadbhāve hetvantaramapekṣate
T11bsa071_u:149: na hi prakāśādayastadātmāna utpannāḥ punaḥ prakāśādibhāve hetvantaramapekṣante /
T11bsa071_u:151: tadvadasthitidharmā cet svabhāvato bhāvo niṣpanno na punastadātmatāyāṃ hetvantaramapekṣate
T11bsa071_u:160: bhāvānāṃ svabhāvānyathātvābhāvāt tatsvabhāvasya paścādiva prāgāpi jananaprasaṅgāt /
T11bsa071_u:162: pūrvabhāvinastu avasthāviśeṣā aṅkurakāraṇasya kāraṇāni iti nānekāntaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:164: (2.10) yadi te 'ntyāḥ samarthāḥ kiṃ na janayanti pratyekamiti /
T11bsa071_u:166: nanu teṣu sahakāriṣu samarthasvabhāveṣu ko 'parasyopayogaḥ? na vai bhāvānāṃ kācit prekṣāpūrvakāritā yataḥ ayamasmāsvanyatamo 'pi samarthaḥ kimasmābhiḥ kartavyam ityālocyāpare nivarteran /
T11bsa071_u:169: te samarthāḥ kiṃ nāparāparaṃ janayantīti cet /
T11bsa071_u:170: na, tatraiva sāmarthyāt tasyaivaikasya janane samarthā nānyasyeti nāparāparajananam /
T11bsa071_u:171: (2.11) bhinnasvabhāvebhyaścakṣurādibhyaḥ sahakāribhya ekakāryotpattau na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syāditi cet /
T11bsa071_u:174: yathā mṛtpiṇḍakulālasūtrā dibhyo bhavato ghaṭasya mṛtpiṇḍādamṛtsvabhāvebhyo vṛkṣādibhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ kulālāttasyaiva mṛdātmanaḥ sataḥ saṃsthāviśeṣātmatayā tadanyebhyo bhinnaḥ sūtrāttasyaiva mṛtsaṃsthāna viśeṣātmanaḥ cakrādervibhaktaḥ svabhāvo bhavati /
T11bsa071_u:175: tadevaṃ na kulālānmṛtsvabhāvatāḥ, na mṛdaḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:176: na ca tayoḥ śāktiviśeṣaviṣayabhede 'pi tajjanitaviśeṣabhedasya kāryasya svabhāvena
T11bsa071_u:178: (2.12) anyadeva saṃsthānaṃ guṇo mṛddravyāt tena bhinnasvabhāvaḥ
T11bsa071_u:181: api ca yadi saṃsthānaṃ bhinnaṃ mṛdaḥ kulālaḥ kiṃ na pṛthakkaroti? guṇasya dravyaparatantratvāt sa kathaṃ pṛthak kriyeta? tatsaṃsthānādhārātmakaṃ yadi svabhāvenaiva tad dravyam, tatsaṃsthānaṃ vā tadādheyātmakaṃ, tadā kimiti kulālavyāpāramapekṣate iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:184: anyathā mṛtpiṇḍasya svabhāvata eva tathāvidhasaṃsthānasambandhayogyatve vastuna eva prāgapi yogyatālakṣaṇā dharmatāstīti saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa sambandhaḥ syāditi /
T11bsa071_u:185: evaṃ tarthi sā yogyatā mṛddravyasya kulālād bhavatīti nānayoḥ svabhāvabhedaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:189: (2.13) tena sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayā naikopayogaviṣayāḥ kāryasyaikasvabhāvatve 'pi vastuta iti yatheha kāraṇabhedo bhinnaviśeṣopayogāt naikakāryaḥ, tathā cakṣurādibhyo vijñānotpattau utreyaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:191: samanantarapratyayādvijñānāccakṣurvijñānasya upalambhātmatā tasyaivopalambhātmanaḥ sataścakṣurindriyādrūpagrahaṇayogyatāpratiniyamaḥ viṣayāttattulyarūpateti abhinnatve 'pi vastutaḥ kāryasya kāraṇānāṃ
T11bsa071_u:192: bhinnebhyaḥ svabhāvebhyo bhinnā eva viśeṣā bhvantīti na kāraṇabhede 'pi
T11bsa071_u:194: ta evaite kāraṇaśaktibhedā yathāsvaṃ prativiśiṣṭakāryajanane 'vyavadheyaśaktitayā pratyupasthitāḥ kṣaṇikatvātsāmagrīkāryasya svabhāvasthityāśrayaityucyante /
T11bsa071_u:195: tathāhi tattebhyaḥ samastebhyaḥ upalambhātmakaṃ rūpagrahaṇaṃ pratiniyataṃ viṣayarūpaṃ ceti prativiśiṣṭasvabhāvamekameva jātam /
T11bsa071_u:196: (2.14) apratirodhaśaktikeṣu anantarakāryeṣu anādheyaviśeṣeṇu kṣaṇikeṣu pratyayeṣu parasparaṃ kaḥ sahakārārthaḥ? na vai sarvatrātiśayotpādanaṃ
T11bsa071_u:197: sahakriyā kā tarhi? ekārthakaraṇaṃ yad bahūnāmapi /
T11bsa071_u:199: tadeva mukhyaṃ sahakāritvaṃ sahakāriṇāṃ, tasyaivāntyasya kāraṇatvāt /
T11bsa071_u:200: tatra ca kṣaṇe ekasya svabhāvasyāvivekād viśeṣasya
T11bsa071_u:205: te samarthā eva svabhāvato 'ntyāḥ pratyayāḥ saha jāyante kṣaṇikā yeṣāṃ prākpaścātpṛthagbhāvo nāsti, yebhyaścānantarameva kāryamutpadyate /
T11bsa071_u:209: tāni enamaparasannidhāna evaṃ kiṃ janayanti? kadācidanyathāpi syuḥ tataścaiko
T11bsa071_u:211: aparāpara pratyayayogena pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayaḥ saṃskārāḥ santanvanto yadyapi kutaścitsāmyātsarūpāḥ pratīyante tathāpi bhitra evaiṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:213: tatra yo 'vyavadhanādideśo rūpendriyādikalāpaḥ sa vijñānajanane samartho hetuḥ /
T11bsa071_u:214: yasteṣāṃ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayaḥ pratyayaviśeṣaḥ sa taddhetujanane samarthaḥ teṣāṃ ca na pūrvaṃ na paścātra pṛthagbhāva iti samarthānapi pūrvāparapṛthagbhāvbhāvino doṣā nopalīyante tena yasteṣāṃ parasparopasarpaṇādihetuḥ sa samarthasya heturiti tatra na kadācidanyathābhāvaḥ
T11bsa071_u:215: (2.16) anena nyāyena sarvatra hetuphalabhāvapratiniyamo draṣṭavyaḥ pratikṣaṇamanyānyasvabhāvabhedānvayinīṣu śaktiṣu, na tu sthiraikasvabhāveṣu bhāveṣu svabhāvasyānyathātvāsaṃbhavāt /
T11bsa071_u:217: anyasahitaḥ karoti na kevala iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:218: kiṃ kevalasya kāryajanane 'samarthaḥ svabhāvaḥ? samartha iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:219: kiṃ na karoti? akurvan kathaṃ samarthaḥ? kuvindādayaḥ paṭādikriyāyāṃ samarthā api na sarvatra kurvantīti cet /
T11bsa071_u:220: krīḍanaśīlo devānāṃ priyaḥ sukhaidhitaḥ kṛtamapi punaḥ punaḥ kārayati, tathāhi bījādivad ityanena nirloṭhitameva /
T11bsa071_u:222: antyāvasthāyāṃ prāgasamarthasya sāmarthyotpattau tasya sāmarthyasya tatsvabhāvatve 'pūrvotpattirevasā
T11bsa071_u:223: atatsvabhāvatve saḥ akāraka eva sāmarthyākhyātpadārthāntarāt kāryotpattyabhyupagamāt /
T11bsa071_u:224: (2.17) api ca yo 'sau sakaleṣu sahakāriṣu karoti sa tadaiva kasmāt karoti
T11bsa071_u:226: aho mahāsāmarthyaṃ mahāprabhāvasya darśanaṃ yasmādatatsvabhāvān api bhāvān svabhāvamātreṇa nānāprakāreṣu vyāpāreṣu niyuṅkte /
T11bsa071_u:227: yadi nāma kiñcit kathañcidatrabhavato darśanaviṣayatām atikrāmet, hanta aprasavadharmakamapetasantānaṃ syaditīyaṃ cintā cittaṃ dunoti /
T11bsa071_u:228: na vai vayam atatsvabhāvānāṃ bhāvānām asmaddarśanavaśāt kāryakriyāṃ brūmaḥ kintu svabhāvenaiva te kāryakāraṇadharmāḥ, tān paśyantaḥ kevalaṃ jānīmahe te ete kārakasvabhāvā iti /
T11bsa071_u:232: svabhāvaḥ kiṃ teṣāṃ tadaivāntyāvasthāyāmutpanna āhosvit prāgapyāsīt? āsīt,
T11bsa071_u:234: tatkimidānīṃ mātā ca vandhyā ca asti?
T11bsa071_u:235: ko vāsya bhāṣitasyārthaḥ- akṣepakriyāsvabhāvaḥ kāryaṃ ca na karotīti /
T11bsa071_u:236: (2.19) sahitaḥ svakāryajananasvabhāvaḥ na kevala iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:239: na hi sa sāhitye 'pi pararūpeṇa kartā syāt /
T11bsa071_u:240: svarūpaṃ ca tasya prāgapi tadeveti kathaṃ kadacit kriyāvirāmaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:241: yasyāpi bhāvah kṣaṇikaḥ tasyāpi kasmāt kevalo na karoti? yadi bhavet kuryādeva /
T11bsa071_u:244: sa kathamekakṣaṇabhāvī anyathā bhavet? yaśca bhavati sa eva na bhavatīti
T11bsa071_u:246: (2.20) yo 'pi manyate- akṣepakriyādharmaiva sa tasya svabhāvaḥ, na sa sāhityamapekṣate, kāryaṃ tu pratyayāntarāpekṣamiti sahitebhya eva jāyate
T11bsa071_u:247: na kevalebhya iti, tasyāpi kathaṃ- sa bhāvaḥ kevalo 'pi karotyeva? kāryaṃ ca tasmātrotpadyate iti tadavastho virodhaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:252: kāryaṃ cāyaṃ kevalo 'pi samarthaḥ san paramapekṣamāṇaṃ
T11bsa071_u:254: evaṃ hi anenātmanaḥ sāmarthyaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati /
T11bsa071_u:255: kāryaṃ paramapekṣata iti tataḥ kevalād anutpattimasya kathayasi sa kevalo 'pi samarthasvabhāva iti tataḥ utpattiṃ
T11bsa071_u:256: brūṣe, ete ca kathamevatraṃ syātām? tadayamīrṣyāśalyavitudyamānamarmā viklavaṃ vikrośatītyupekṣāmevārhati
T11bsa071_u:258: na tu akṣaṇikānāṃ yeṣāṃ pṛthagapi bhāvaḥ sambhavati pṛthak kāryakaraṇasambhavena sahakāritvaniyamāyogāt
T11bsa071_u:259: (2.21) yatra tu santānopakāreṇa bhāvāḥ hetutāṃ pratipadyante, yathā taṇḍulabījādibhya odanāṅkurādijanmani dahanodakapṛthivyādayaḥ, tatra santānāśrayeṇa viśeṣotpādanaṃ pratyayānāṃ sahakriyocyate na dravyāśrayeṇa,
T11bsa071_u:261: nahi taṇḍulādīnāṃ viśeṣānutpattau dahanādibhāve 'pi odanajanma syāt /
T11bsa071_u:262: tathā prabhāsvarādapavarakaṃ praviṣṭasya yadīndriyaṃ svopakāribhyo 'tiśayaṃ krameṇa na pratipadyeta
T11bsa071_u:264: akṣepakāriṣu indriyādiṣu na viśeṣotpattiḥ parasparataḥ sambhavati /
T11bsa071_u:265: tatra yathāsvaṃ pratyayaiḥ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayairye yogyadeśādyavasthā jātāste saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā jñānahetutāṃ pratipadyante ityekārthakriyaiva sahakāritvam /
T11bsa071_u:266: (2.22) yatra tu viśeṣamutpādayantaḥ sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayāḥ tatra
T11bsa071_u:267: hetusantānaḥ pratyayāntarāṇyapekṣata iti tataḥ svabhāvāntarasya pratilambhaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:268: tatra svarasataḥ hetupratyayānāṃ pūrvopanipātakṣaṇānāṃ nivṛttau tebhya eva viśiṣṭakṣaṇotpattirevaṃ krameṇa yāvadatyantātiśayavato
T11bsa071_u:273: tataśca parasparaviśeṣotpādānapekṣiṇa eva sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ kurvīran /
T11bsa071_u:278: na ca sahakāriṇaḥ parasparakāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣotpādane nityaṃ yogyāvasthāḥ, yena nityānuṣakta eṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ syāt /
T11bsa071_u:280: tenādyo viśeṣaḥ sahakāribhyo nirupakārasya notpadyata iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:284: na viśeṣotpādanāt sahakāriṇāṃ sahakāritvaṃ paramārthataḥ sambhavati /
T11bsa071_u:286: (2.24) atha kathamekārthakriyāpi bhavet sāpi na bhavet parasparato viśeṣarahitānām /
T11bsa071_u:288: tathāca, tasmād viśeṣād bhavanaśīlaṃ kāryamapi kevalāt syāditi cet /
T11bsa071_u:289: atroktamuttaraṃ pratikṣaṇamaparāparaiḥ pratyayaiḥ yathā bhāvasantāne viśeṣasyotpattiḥ,
T11bsa071_u:290: yogyadeśatādyavasthāviśeṣāḥ kāryakaraṇaśīlāḥ, teṣāṃ ca yata utpattiḥ,
T11bsa071_u:291: pratyekaṃ ca sāmarthye 'pi kevalānāmakriyā, kartṛviśeṣasya pṛthagekaikasya bhāvasyābhāvāt
T11bsa071_u:292: kāryadvaividhyaṃ ca sahakāribhiḥ akṣepakārindriyavijñānavacca kāryakāraṇayoḥ svabhāvabhedāditi
T11bsa071_u:295: anantarakāryavat, tataḥ ye viśeṣā jāyante te tajjanmānaḥ tatprakṛtitvāditi nānavasthā /
T11bsa071_u:296: tathā yadyakṣaṇiko 'pi bhāvaḥ kārya karoti, karotu nāma, sa yadi akṣepakartṛdharmā, tadā pṛthagbhāvasya sambhavātkevalo 'pi tathā syād ityuktam /
T11bsa071_u:298: tasmādakṣaṇikānāṃ kāraṇānām ekārthakriyayā na kaścit sahakāritvaniyamaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:299: nāpi santatyopakāreṇeti na tasya kaścitsahakārīti kevalo 'pi kuryāt /
T11bsa071_u:300: prāyastu saṃghātasthāyī bhāvasantānaḥ sahakāripratyayairupajanitaviśeṣaḥ svakāryaṃ kurvan dṛṣṭo bījādivat /
T11bsa071_u:303: (2.26) tasmādyo yadātmā sa svasattāmātreṇa tādṛśo bhavati na bhūtvā tadbhāve parābhisaṃskāramapekṣata iti svabhāvato 'sthitidharmaṇo bhāvasya na kiñcitrāśakāraṇaiḥ /
T11bsa071_u:304: sthitidharmaṇo 'pi bhāvasya na nāśakāraṇaiḥ kiñcit svabhāvānyathātvasya kenacit kartumaśakyatvāt
T11bsa071_u:305: tadanyathātvapratipattau sa tatsvabhāva eva na syāditi pūrva eva vikalpaḥ syāt /
T11bsa071_u:307: yaśca parasmādanyathābhāvaḥ so 'paraḥ svabhāvaḥ yaścāparaḥ sa kathaṃ tasya syāt? svabhāvabhedo hi vastubhedalakṣaṇam /
T11bsa071_u:308: tathā ca yaḥ sthitidharmā jātaḥ na tasyānyathābhāvaḥ syāt /
T11bsa071_u:309: etena kaṭhinādīnāṃ tāmrādīnām agnyādeḥ dravatvādisvabhāvāntarotpattiḥ pratyuktā /
T11bsa071_u:310: tatrāpi pūrvakasya svarasanirodhitvādvināśe 'gnyāderupādānāccāpara eva dravādisvabhāvaḥ utpannaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:316: nedaṃ vikalpadvayamatikrāmati - kiṃ nityo bhāva utānityaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:317: prāṅnityo bhūtvā paścādanityo bhavatīti ca bruvāṇo bhāvadvayaṃ cāha nityānityasvabhāvabhedam
T11bsa071_u:318: prāktanasya nityābhimatasya svabhāvasya svayaṃ nāśaṃ bruvāṇaḥ sarvadaiva nāśamanāśaṃ ca prāheti pūrvasmin vināśaheturasamartha eva /
T11bsa071_u:319: na prāṅnityo bhūtvā paścādanityaḥ bhavati, kiṃ tarhi, paścādapi nitya eva,
T11bsa071_u:321: sa tarhi bhāvaḥ svabhāvena nāśamanāviśan kathaṃ naṣṭo
T11bsa071_u:323: tasmāt satyasya vināśe vināśasvabhāvena tena bhavitavyaṃ, tathāpi vināśaheturvyartha ityuktam
T11bsa071_u:324: tena svabhāvato naścare 'naśvare vā bhāve na vināśahetorupayogaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:325: (2.28) tasmādvināśaṃ pratyanapekṣo bhāvastadbhāvaniyataḥ iti yaḥ san sa vināśī naśvaratāyā nivṛttau sattvanivṛtirityanvayavyatirekasiddhiḥ /
T11bsa071_u:327: na hi sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāva iti na tatribandhanānvayavyatirekāsiddhiriti cet /
T11bsa071_u:334: itthaṃ ca yat sattat kṣaṇikameveti vyāptisiddhiḥ /
T11bsa071_u:336: kāryakāraṇabhāvena gamakatve sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ syāt, sarvathā janyajanakabhāvād iti
T11bsa071_u:340: tasmāt kāryaṃ svabhāvairyāvadbhiravinābhāvi kāraṇe teṣāṃ hetuḥ /
T11bsa071_u:342: taireva ca dharmairye tairvinā na bhavanti /
T11bsa071_u:347: (3.2) kasyacitkadācitkutaścidbhāve 'pi sarvastādṛśastathāvidhajanmeti kuto 'vasitam, tathā ca nānvayavyatirekāviti cet /
T11bsa071_u:350: tatra yadi dhūmo 'gnyādisāmagjyā anyato 'pi bhavettadā tasya tajjanyaḥ svabhāvo na bhavatīti sakṛdapi tato na bhavet /
T11bsa071_u:354: na ca dhūmasya tadatajjanyaḥ svabhāvo yuktaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:359: tasmādyo dhūmajananaḥ so 'gnyādisāmagrīviśeṣo yaḥ agnyādisāmagrīviśeṣeṇa janitaḥ sa eva dhūmo bhavatīti kāryakāraṇayorevaṃ svabhāvasya niyamāt tadvijātīyādutpattirna bhavati /
T11bsa071_u:360: tadyādṛśaṃ kāryaṃ yādṛśāt kāraṇād dṛṣṭamekadā tattanna vyabhicarati /
T11bsa071_u:361: tena siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve kāryasya kāraṇena vyāptiḥ siddhā bhavati /
T11bsa071_u:362: (3.3) nanu vijātīyādapi kiñcid bhavad dṛṣṭaṃ tadyathā go mayādeḥ śālūkādiḥ
T11bsa071_u:367: na hi ākāratulyataiva bhāvānāṃ tattve nimittam, abhinnākārāṇāmapi keṣāñcidanyato viśeṣājjātibhedadarśanāt
T11bsa071_u:368: anyathā hi vilakṣaṇāyā api sāmagrayā avilakṣaṇakāryotpattau na kāraṇabhedābhedābhyāṃ kāryabhedābhedāvityahetukau viśvasya bhedābhedau syātām /
T11bsa071_u:369: tathā hi na bhedādbheda iti abhedādapi nābhedaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:370: tadvyatiriktaśca na kaścidbhāvasvabhāva ityahetukatvādbhāvānāṃ nityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syāt
T11bsa071_u:374: sādhanāyopādīyeta, nāparaṃ, tasyaiva tatra śakteḥ, anyasya cāśakteḥ tayostajjananetarasvabhāvatvena bhedāt /
T11bsa071_u:375: tajjananasvabhāvavilakṣaṇādapi tasyotpattau na tajjananaśaktipratiniyama iti yat kiñcit yataḥ kutaścitsyāt /
T11bsa071_u:376: tajjananaśaktisāmye tu tadeveti na kāryaṃ duṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ vyabhicarati /
T11bsa071_u:384: yatra yasmitrupalabhyamāne niyamena yasyopalabdhiḥ bhavati yogyatāyā aviśeṣāt satatsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ
T11bsa071_u:387: sa kevalastadapekṣayā tadanyaśceducyate tadā tajjñānaṃ tatsvabhāvo vā jñātṛjñeya dharmalakṣaṇānupalabdhiḥ
T11bsa071_u:394: anyabhāvalakṣaṇo 'bhāvaḥ svayaṃ pramāṇasiddhastadabhāvavyavahāraṃ sādhayet, tatsiddhisiddho veti na
T11bsa071_u:396: (4.3) sa evānyabhāvastadviṣayā copalabdhistadabhāvasya kiṃ na sādhanam?
T11bsa071_u:397: kiṃ punarabhāvasya siddhireva tadabhāvasiddhiḥ? iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:400: yatsiddhau yasya na siddhistattasya liṅgaṃ bhavati dhūmāgnivat /
T11bsa071_u:401: anyabhāvasiddhayaiva tadabhāvaḥ prasidhyati, tasya tadanyāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya tattvavyavasthāpakena
T11bsa071_u:403: (4.4) sambandhābhāvācca tacca tasya liṅgaṃ yadi syāt, tasya tena kaścitsambandho bhavet
T11bsa071_u:404: yathā kṛtakatvasyānityatvena ekārthasamavāyo dhūmasya vā liṅginaikārthasamavāyaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:406: naivaṃ kaścid bhāvābhāvayoḥ sambandhaḥ yenāsyānyabhāvaḥ sādhanaṃ syāt
T11bsa071_u:408: śabdārthayoḥ tatpratipādanābhiprāye sati tatprayogāt kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇo 'vinābhāvalakṣaṇo vā sambandhaḥ syāt /
T11bsa071_u:409: ayaṃ cātra na sambhavati yataḥ viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ syāt /
T11bsa071_u:410: siddhe hi tayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāve tanmukhena viṣayaviṣabhibhāvaḥ syāt /
T11bsa071_u:411: sa eva cāsati sambandhe na sidhyati /
T11bsa071_u:414: tathā ca ghaṭābhāvastadanyabhāvāt iti ghaṭasya sarvatra sarvadā cābhāvaḥ prasajyeta
T11bsa071_u:415: / na, pradeśādirdharmī ghaṭābhāvena viśeṣyata iti tadviśeṣaṇabhūto 'bhāvaḥ
T11bsa071_u:418: na ca liṅgaliṅganorasambandhaḥ, anyabhāvasya pradeśādinā sambandhād iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:420: yatraiva hi pradeśādau yatrāstīti ucyate sa eva tenāsaṃsṛṣṭo 'nyabhāvaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:421: taddarśanādevāsya ghaṭo nāsti iti vikalpo bhavati iti kathaṃ tasyaiva liṅgaliṅgibhāvaḥ?
T11bsa071_u:422: (4.6) na cātra sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvakalpanā sambhavati yena sāmānyaṃ
T11bsa071_u:423: heturbhaved viśeṣo dharmāti, tadviśeṣapratipattereva tadabhāvasya pratīteḥ, tasyānyatrānvayasyābhāvāt pratijñārthaikadeśatvācca na hetutā /
T11bsa071_u:424: na ca yatra pradeśamātraṃ tatra ghaṭābhāvaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:425: tādṛśe kevale pradeśe sarvatrābhāva iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:427: sa ca tatpratipattāveva siddha iti kasya idānīṃ talliṅgam? anvayasyānugamanamapi nirarthakam
T11bsa071_u:429: (4.7) asti virodhaḥ sambandhaḥ tato 'nyabhāvādabhāvasya siddhiḥ iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:430: kena kasya virodho 'nyabhāvena pratiyoginaḥ kiṃ nu vai pratiyogī pramātumiṣṭo yena liṅgaliṅganorvirodhaḥ sambandhaḥ syāt?
T11bsa071_u:432: tasmin prameye liṅgaliṅginoḥ kathaṃ virodhaḥ? tasmātsambandhābhāvaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:436: na vai kutaścit sambandhādanyabhāvastadabhāvagamaka iṣṭaḥ kintu anyabhāva eva tadabhāvo yathoktaṃ prāk /
T11bsa071_u:437: tasyānyāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya kevalasyaikātmavyasthitasya tadātmanā pariccedasyaivānyavyavaccedatvāt tasya kaivalyamevāparasya vaikalyamiti tadanyabhāva eva tadabhāvaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:439: anyathā tasya pariccedena tato 'nyasya avyavaccede tatparicceda eva na syāt /
T11bsa071_u:441: ya eva vyavahāraḥ kasyacitkvaceddeśe darśanāt prāptiparihārārthaḥ sa na syāt /
T11bsa071_u:442: na hyayamanalaṃ paśyatrapi kevalam analameva paśyatīti kathaṃ salilārthī tatra na praverteta? anupalambhena salilābhāvaḥ pratīyata iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:444: 'yamanupalambho nāma? yadi salilopalambhābhāvaḥ tadā kathamabhāvaḥ kasyacitpratipattiḥ pratipattiheturvā? tasyāpi kathaṃ pratipattiḥ? tasya tato vānyasya kasyacidapyapratipattāvapi yadyabhāvaḥ pratīyate tadā svāpamadamūrccāvyavadhānapṛṣṭhībhāvādyavasthāsvapi kiṃ na pratīyate?
T11bsa071_u:447: 'yaṃ salilam iti nādhyavasyatīti na tiṣṭhetrāpi pratiṣṭheta /
T11bsa071_u:449: (4.9) tata evaikasya darśanād anyābhāvagatiścet kathamekaṃ dṛṣṭamanyatrāstīti pratyāyayati? tasyaiva kevalasya darśanād iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:451: tasmāttīrādarśineva śakuninā dūraparyaṭayāpi pratyāgantavyamityalam avidyamānapratiṣṭhānayā diśaḥ pratipattyā /
T11bsa071_u:452: (4.10) yadyekapariccedādevānyavyavaccedaḥ sidhyati tadā sarvasyānyasya aviśeṣeṇa tatrābhāvasiddhirbhavet
T11bsa071_u:456: (4.11) ekātmapariccedāt tasya tadanyātmavyavaccedo bhavati tadātmaniyatapratibhāsajñānāt na hi tadātmā tadanyasyātmā bhavati /
T11bsa071_u:457: anyātmāvyavaccede pravṛttinivṛttyoḥ abhāva iti pūrvaḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:458: taṃ ca deśakālasvabhāvāvasthāniyataṃ tadātmanopalabhamānā buddhiḥ tathātvapracyutimasya vyavaccinati
T11bsa071_u:460: bhavati, yadi anyathābhāvo vyavaccinno bhavatiḥ tathātvaṃ ca tasyaiva bhavati nānyasyeti anyathābhūtāttathābhūtaṃ vyavaccindatyeva tat
T11bsa071_u:465: tasya tadanyatayā vyāptyabhāve tena tadarthāvyavaccedātpunarapi bhāvasyāpariccedaprasaṅgāt
T11bsa071_u:467: vyavaccināti, tṛtīyaprakārābhāvaṃ ca sūcayati iti ekapramāṇavyāpāra eṣaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:468: tathāhi kvacitpramāṇaṃ pravṛtaṃ tadeva tadanyasmād vyavaccinattī, tasyaiva pariccedāt /
T11bsa071_u:469: tadanyadeva ca tasmād vyavaccinatti anyasya tatra apariccedāt
T11bsa071_u:470: / atastadeva pramāṇaṃ prakārāntabhāvaṃ sādhayati, tasmin dṛṣṭatadanyatvena sarvasyaiva vyasthāpanāt, atadanyasyaiva ca tattvena vyavasthāpanāt /
T11bsa071_u:476: (4.13) anyabhāvaviṣayasyopalabdhirapi tadabhāvasya sādhikeṣṭaiva na tu liṅgatvena /
T11bsa071_u:479: na hi anyasya bhāvaṃ pratipadya tatpratipatteḥ anvayavyatirekau prasādhya tadabhāvaṃ pratipadyate
T11bsa071_u:480: kiṃ tarhi? tadanyaṃ pratipadyamāna eva tadabhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
T11bsa071_u:481: darśanānantaram idamasti idaṃ tu nāsti iti vyavasthāpanāt /
T11bsa071_u:482: tacca tasya liṅgaṃ bhavati yasyānvayi vyatireko ca /
T11bsa071_u:484: na hi evaṃ śakyaṃ darśayituṃ yatra anyabhāvopalabdhistatra tadabhāvaḥ iti /
T11bsa071_u:487: pramāṇāntaraṃ nāsti, kiṃtu saiva tadanyabhāvopalabdhiḥ sādhyadharmasya sādhiketi anavasthā dṛṣṭāntānāmityapratipattiḥ /
T11bsa071_u:490: pratyakṣalakṣaṇenānupalambhena siddhaḥ san mūḍhapratipattāvabhāvavyavahāraṃ sādhayed iti alaṃ prasaṅgena /
T11bsa071_u:495: sa tathā siddhaḥ san kāryavyāpyayorabhāvam abhāvavyavahāraṃ vā sādhayati /
T11bsa071_u:496: svabhāvānupalabdhau tu anupalabdhyā liṅgabhūtayā abhāvavyavahāra eva sādhyate /
T11bsa071_u:497: (4.15) yadi kāraṇavyāpakau tadanyabhāvasiddhayānupalabdhyā siddhāsad vyavahārāvanyasyābhāvamabhāvavyavahāṃra ca sādhayataḥ /
T11bsa071_u:498: sā ca tayorupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāvevāsadvyavahārasya sādhiketi kathaṃ tayoḥ parokṣe 'rtheprayogaḥ? naiva prayogaḥ pramāṇatayā, liṇgasyāniścayāt /
T11bsa071_u:499: kevalaṃ kāraṇavyāpakayorhi siddhasambandhayoryadyabhāvaḥ parasyāpi avaśyamabhāvaḥ iti etasya darśanārthamete prayujyete iti /
T11bsa071_u:500: eṣa eva pakṣadharmo 'nvayavyatirekavān iti tadaṃśena vyāptaḥ trilakṣaṇa eva trividha eva heturgamakaḥ svaśādhyadharmāvyabhicārāt /
T11bsa071_u:502: trīṇi caitāni abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ jñātatvaṃ ceti /
T11bsa071_u:503: tatrābādhitaviṣayatvaṃ tāvat pṛthag lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati, bādhāvinābhāvayorvirodhāt /
T11bsa071_u:504: avinābhāvo hi satyeva sādhyadharme bhāvo hetoḥ /
T11bsa071_u:505: sa hetustallakṣaṇaḥ dharmiṇi syād atra ca sādhyadharmaḥ kathaṃ na bhavet? pratyakṣānumāne hi sādhyadharmaṃ
T11bsa071_u:506: bādhamāne taṃ dharmiṇo niṣkāsayataḥ tasmiṃśca satyeva heturbhavan taṃ tatraivāvasthāpayatīti paraṃ bata bhāvānāmasvāsthyam /
T11bsa071_u:507: anyatra sādhyadharmeṇāvinābhāvī heturna punaḥ sādhyadharmiṇeveti cet /
T11bsa071_u:508: tat kimayaṃ tapasvī śaṇḍhamudvāhya putraṃ mṛgayate? yasya dharmiṇyasatyapi sādhyadharme bhāvaḥ, tamupadarśya kathaṃ sa dharmī
T11bsa071_u:513: tatkimidānīṃ hetoḥ sāmarthyam? abādhayaiva sādhyasiddhervyartho hetuḥ /
T11bsa071_u:514: bādhāyāmapi sādhyābhāvasya tena sādhanāt kutaḥ sādhanasya sāmarthyam /
T11bsa071_u:515: aniyame bādhakapramāṇavṛttau sādhyābhāvasya, bādhakapramāṇasyābhāvaḥ sādhyābhāvasya ca saṃbhavaḥ syāditi na sāmarthyamabādhāyāḥ /
T11bsa071_u:517: kiṃ tarhi? bādhāyā anupalabdhiḥ sā ca puruṣasya kvacid bādhāyāḥ saṃbhave 'pi syāditi sa hetuprayogasya viṣayaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:518: kiṃ nu vai heturbādhopalabdherbibheti na punarbādhāyā yena bādhāmanādṛtya tadanupalabdhau prayoktavya iṣṭaḥ? sa tarhi paramārthena- 'bādhā kimasti
T11bsa071_u:519: nāsti' ityanapekṣya bādhāyā anupalabdhau prayoktavyaḥ? kimarthaṃ
T11bsa071_u:521: sa kiṃ kvacit satyāmapi bādhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ sādhayed yenāsyā abhāvaniścayaṃ prati yatno na kriyate hetuśca pratyujyate
T11bsa071_u:522: / evaṃ ca sati abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ hetulakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati /
T11bsa071_u:525: yathā ca bādhānupalabdhau tāmabhyupagamya prayujyate tathā tadupalabdhāvapi
T11bsa071_u:527: (5.4) na bādhāyāṃ satyāṃ hetoḥ sāmarthyamiti cet /
T11bsa071_u:529: anirṇītabādhāsambhavo hetuḥ prayogaṃ hārhati, mā bhūt bādhāyāḥ
T11bsa071_u:533: yato hetorbādhāsambhavakṛtam asāmarthyaṃ na sambhavet? atha tannivṛttau bādhā nivartate
T11bsa071_u:536: upalambhasya nivṛttāvapi bādhāyā anivṛttau tadavasthaṃ hetorasāmarthyamityaprayogaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:537: tasmāt svasādhyabhāvābhāvādhyāmanyathāpi bhavanhetuḥ dharmiṇi na kiñcidbhāvayati na vibhāvayati iti tadupakṣepo na samarthaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:540: (5.5) tatrāma tasmād viśeṣaṇāntaraṃ bhavet lakṣaṇāntaratvena copādānamarhati yasya bhāve 'pi yasya aparasyābhāvaḥ syāt /
T11bsa071_u:541: tadyathā pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe ca bhāva iti /
T11bsa071_u:542: n acaitad abādhāyā avinābhāve sati sambhavati iti na sādhyaviparyayāvinābhāvinorhetuviruddhayorviṣaye bādhā saṃbhavati iti na tadabhāvaḥ pṛthaganayorlakṣaṇāntaratvena vācyaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:543: tasmād hetoḥ prayoge pratijñādoṣāṇāṃ saṃbhavo nāsti /
T11bsa071_u:547: katham? eko hi hetuḥ svasādhyabhāva eva bhavediti tatrāvyabhicārī tatraiva tasmādanyo 'pi kathaṃ heturbhavati? ekasya yat sādhyaṃ tadabādhakasya dharmasya bhāva eva bhāvāditi bādhayā samānam /
T11bsa071_u:549: kiṃ yo vastuto 'sambhavatpratihetuḥ sa samyagjñānasya viparyayasya vā heturiṣṭa āhosvidapradarśitapratihetuḥ? kiṃ cātaḥ?
T11bsa071_u:551: na hi aniścitātmanaḥ pratipādakadharmasya tallakṣaṇatvaṃ yathā sandigdhasya pakṣadharmatvasya
T11bsa071_u:552: nāpi sandigdhalakṣaṇo heturbhavediti na kaścid heturbhavet /
T11bsa071_u:553: tulye lakṣaṇe di dṛṣṭaḥ pratiyoginaḥ saṃbhavo
T11bsa071_u:555: sati vā viśeṣe sa viśeṣo hetorlakṣaṇam /
T11bsa071_u:556: yatastadviśeṣād heturekāntena nirastapratipakṣaḥ svasādhyaṃ niścāyayatīti atallakṣaṇo na hetuḥ syāt tathā ca vyarthā ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣā /
T11bsa071_u:557: ato viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo lakṣaṇaṃ hīyeta svalakṣaṇayuktayorhetvorekatra dharmiṇi virodhenopanipāte sati viruddhāvyabhicārī iti /
T11bsa071_u:558: (5.8) na ca tasya viśeṣasya svarūpaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ, yadrūpaṃ pratītya pratiyoginaḥ sambhavāsambhavāvutpaśyāmaḥ
T11bsa071_u:559: tasmātrāstyevaṃ viśeṣa iti sarvatra śaṅkayā bhavitavyam /
T11bsa071_u:560: dṛṣṭapratihetorapi hetoḥ prāgitareṇa na kaścidviśeṣo lakṣyate /
T11bsa071_u:565: (5.9) athāpradarśitapratihetuḥ yathāha, "yadā tarhi śabdatvaṃ nityamabhyupagaccati tadāyaṃ hetureva syād yadyatra anityatvahetuṃ
T11bsa071_u:568: gurubhirabhihitatvādaprakāśyaṃ, nyāyamanupālayadbhirasaṃvaraṇīyamiti kaṣṭataraṃ vyasanaṃ kathaṃ nirvoḍhuṃ śakyeta? sa tāvadayaṃ hetuḥ vastūni svasādhyaprakṛtīni kṛtvā tatpramāṇakān puruṣān abhyudayaniḥ śreyasābhyāṃ yojayitvā punaśca pratibhāvatā puruṣeṇa hetvantaranidarśanena
T11bsa071_u:569: utkīlitasādhanasāmarthyaḥ tāni vastūni tadbhāvasampadastāṃśca puruṣān abhyudayaniḥ śreyasasampadaḥ pracyāvya bhraṣṭarājya iva rājā tapovanaṃ gaccatīti kimatra brūmaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:570: (5.10) puruṣapratibhākṛtaṃ hi yadi sādhanatvaṃ syāt tadā na kiñcit sādhanamasādhanaṃ vā
T11bsa071_u:571: sa ca heturyadi svabhāvatastaddharmabhāvī tadā kathamanyathā kriyeta? vastusvabhāvānyathābhāvasyābhāvāt
T11bsa071_u:576: (5.11) jñānaṃ punarna liṅgasyātmarūpamiti kathaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati
T11bsa071_u:578: pratipatturavisaṃvādakalingasvarūpamabhidhīyate yasya darśanād ayaṃ pravibhāgena sādhanaṃ vyavasthāpya tasyeṣṭārthasaṃnidhānasaṃpratyayāt pravṛttimavalambate /
T11bsa071_u:579: tathā yadasyātmarūpaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ na tu pararūpam /
T11bsa071_u:580: pratipattijanmani upayogamātrāt tallakṣaṇatve prameyapuruṣādīnāmapi tallakṣaṇatvaṃ bhavet
T11bsa071_u:581: na hi teṣvapi asatsu liṅgini jñānaṃ bhavati /
T11bsa071_u:584: sapakṣavipakṣayordarśanādarśanamātrato gamakaṃ hetumiccatāṃ naiva samartho heturbhavati satorapi darśanādarśanayoragamakatvadarśanāt /
T11bsa071_u:585: tena bhāvābhāvābhyāmeva gamako heturiti jñāpanārtha niścitagrahaṇam /
T11bsa071_u:586: tena pararūpaṃ liṅgasya lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati, tena liṅgasya rūpaviśeṣānamidhānāt
T11bsa071_u:591: jñānasattānibandhanatvājjñeyasattāvyavasthāyāḥ iti sarvatra jñeyasattāvyavasthaiva tatsādhanaṃ pramāṇamākarṣatiḥ parārthatvācca śāstrapraṇayanasyaḥ trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ saṃvādakamiti tadrūpamapratipattṛṇāṃ tataḥ pravṛttirna bhavatīti paropalakṣaṇātvādeva pravartake jñānaṃ siddhamḥ tathāpi tāveva viśiṣṭau bhāvābhāvau kecid darśanādarśanamātreṇa vyavasthāpayantīti teṣāṃ niṣedhārtho 'yaṃ niścitaśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ /
T11bsa071_u:593: tasmāt pratibandhasādhakapramāṇavṛttyaiva bhāvābhāvau sidhyata iti vipratipattinirāsārthamasmābhirniścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
T11bsa071_u:594: yato 'pi trairūpyavacanamātreṇa tatsādhanapramāṇākṣepasiddhiḥ, na jñānaṃ pṛthagato rūpāntaraṃ bhavati, tenaivāvagatatvād, upalayārthavat pakṣadharmatvāt /
T11bsa071_u:595: (5.14) anvayavyatirekayorapi tarhi na pṛthakatvam, ekasya prayogādubhayagateriti cet /
T11bsa071_u:600: nanu tatraiva bhāva ityatra tadarthatayā tadabhāve
T11bsa071_u:601: 'bhāvo gamyate, atadbhāve 'vaśyamabhāva ityatra ca tadbhāve bhāva iti parasparākṣepa iti cet /
T11bsa071_u:607: (5.15) tasmāt tatraiva bhāva iti na bhāva evocyate itareṇāpi nā bhāva eva yena bhāvo 'bhāvo vā dvitīyamākṣipet /
